revised_title: Dr. Wallis's Theories on Hail, Thunder, and Lightning
tldr: Dr. Wallis discusses the generation of hail and the effects of thunder and lightning, suggesting that they may be caused by a mixture of nitre and sulphurous vapors in the air, similar to the ingredients in gunpowder. He also proposes that the large size of hailstones may be due to their continued freezing during their descent.
